commit message: Preemptive version bump
GameActivity subtitle can now be passed via intent; Filename suffixes are now stripped away in the UI.
Long touching a word in the story will now underline it.
BUGFIX: Stop talking whne the activity is paused.
Highlights are now persisted
New highlighting algorithm: matches words exactly now ... and is faster.
Limited the initial highlights to the compass directions. The user is likely to understand them as a group of similar things, whereas it might not be obvious why door, box,... are highlighted.
Fixed filename
Added 'Mina' an alternative nightmode colorscheme
Removed references to GameActivity
Added option to automatically hide the keyboard when pressing DONE.
Externalized urls
Cleanup: removed GameActivity dependency
Cleanup
Cleanup
Use shortcut classname  to make it easier to create bundled games.
Put all strings that would need to be modified when building a custom distribution (interpreter bundled with games) in strings_custom.xml
Moved 'Browse Catalog' into the menu of the library fragment
Made each skin a file of its own.
Adding new themes no longer requires code changes. NOTE: Everyone will be bumbed back to the default theme upon upgrade.
Cleanup
Added fullscreen mode
Bugfix: handle accented characters in input correctly.
BUGFIX: inform the user that changing the theme requires a restart and do so if requested.
More logging
WORKAROUND: Prevent games from crashing if they use OP_CHECK_UNICODE or OP_PRINT_UNICODE
BETTER WORKAROUND: instead of silently ignoring a request to print unicode characters, print a uFFFD.
Save highlights as a json file, not an object dump.
Command buttons are now configurable.
Save highlights to file when they are toggled.
Lot's of internal changes, theme and buttonbar gets reset -> can't be called 1.x any longer.
BUGFIX: make sure the directories are always recreated when needed.
